>Has anyone ever gotten my version of NEAT to compile on Cygwin?  I 
>think the main thing I'm unsure about is whether gtk--, which I used 
>for visualization, installs ok on Cygwin?   Anyway, thanks for any 
>insights.  (I wouldn't be surprised if no one has done this, but 
>it's worth a try just to ask)

Well, as you know I had to modify NEAT to remove visualisations. For 
what it's worth, GTK+ is installable from the Cygwin setup program.

--Darren
